atlantis_talk_03_friend_01a:
Last time I came to the Great Crater, I was trying
to go see my mom...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_03_friend_01b:
Last time I came to the Great Crater, I was trying
to go see my dad...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_03_friend_02:
I got about this far, then I got attacked by some
kind of creature I’d never seen before.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_03_rival_01: Really? What kind of Pokémon was it?![npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_03_friend_03a:
It wasn’t even like a Pokémon. More like this
crazy-violent, rampaging sort of thing...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_03_friend_03b:
It wasn’t even like a Pokémon. More like this
crazy-weird, metallic, machine thing...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_03_rival_02a:
You sure it wasn’t just a Pokémon that’s a little
more, I dunno, rampagey than average?[npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_03_rival_02b:
You sure it wasn’t just a Pokémon that’s a little
more, I dunno, roboty than average?[npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_03_friend_04:
Yeah, I’m sure! It was like a completely different
creature altogether![npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_03_friend_05:
And it hurt Mabosstiff real bad, so it’s not like I’d
just forget![npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_03_friend_06:
I don’t ever want to run into that awful thing
again...[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_03_rival_04: Then I really hope I get to see it![npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_03_botan_01:
You’re real tactless sometimes, Nemona.
You know that?[npcn:8]
